name: Le Méridien Vienna
description: An individual design hotel in Vienna in the comfort zone. Le Méridien Vienna is style not bivouac, it is art puzzle and gallery. Located in the heart of Vienna, the design hotel is at the hub of the city’s artistic jewels. They surprise and inspire. Spacious + newly designed guest rooms + suites make you happy, in roomy bathrooms you revive. Your view falls on Vienna’s splendid Ringstrasse, the serene Schillerplatz, or sun-filled courtyard. At last - vacation in Vienna, at Le Méridien hotel in the city’s epicentre. Develop your company at Le Méridien conference hotel in Vienna. Celebrate the happiest day of your life at Le Méridien wedding hotel - straight or gay. You sleep regally, dine magnificently. Le Méridien hotel the cosmopolitan Viennese.Marriott

name: Melia Vienna
description: Located in Austria’s highest skyscraper, the DC Tower, the Melia Vienna features luxurious and modern rooms as well as a rooftop terrace with a cocktail bar offering stunning views of the Danube River and the city of Vienna. Free WiFi is provided in the entire property. Each room and suite is fitted with floor-to-ceiling windows, a modern interior decoration and cutting-edge technology. Amenities such as a Nespresso coffee machine (with 2 free capsules per day), a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box are standard in all rooms. Mediterranean as well as local cuisine can be enjoyed at the 57th Restaurant, while local cuisine and cocktails can be enjoyed at the Flow Restaurant and the Flow Bar. The 57th Lounge Cocktail Bar is open from 18:00 until 01:00 from Monday to Sunday. Every Friday and Saturday, a DJ is available from 21:00 for entertainment. A rich breakfast buffet is served every morning. The Kaisermühlen-VIC Underground Station (line U1) is right in front of the building and provides direct connections to St. Stephen’s Cathedral and the city centre within 6 minutes. The airport bus stops nearby as well. The Vienna International Centre and the Austria Center Vienna, an exhibition and conference center, are both within 400 metres from the Melia Vienna.

name: Intercontinental Vienna, An IHG Hotel
description: The InterContinental Vienna hotel places you moments away from the world-renowned Vienna State Opera and stylish shopping on pedestrianised Kaerntner Strasse. Behind its functionalist exterior, the hotel's magnificent wood-panelled lobby is hung with chandeliers, while our grand ballroom is ideal for hosting elegant events. You can also work out in the state-of-the-art Fitness Center, experience typical Viennese coffee house culture, or savor classic cocktails in the refined Intermezzo Bar.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hilton Vienna Plaza
description: Beautifully located on Ringstrasse, Hilton Vienna Plaza is within walking distance of St. Stephen's Cathedral, Burgtheater, the State Opera and Hofburg Imperial Palace. You'll find exclusive amenities and unique service in this designer hotel, just 20 minutes' drive from the airport. Sample French- and Austrian-inspired cuisine at Brasserie, EMILE – the winner of a toque from Gault Millau in 2015. The restaurant guide's inspectors awarded the brasserie with 14 points, a fine rating for high quality food. Enjoy specialties prepared with fresh seasonal ingredients and an excellent selection of Austrian and international wines. During the day and well into the night, relax with Martini specials, absinthe and other delicious drinks at our hotel bar. Conveniently located in Vienna's commercial center, Hilton Vienna Plaza provides a Lobby Lounge connectivity station with both PC and Mac computers. Before arrival and through departure, your Plaza host will reach out to ensure your experience is everything you want it to be. Business meetings are easy using our flexible function rooms for 2-150 guests. WiFi is available throughout the hotel and all meeting rooms offer natural daylight. A/V and videoconferencing equipment are available for rent. Our timeless guest rooms offer a range of thoughtful amenities, such as a work desk and a marble bathroom. Upgrade to a suite for a separate living room. Executive rooms and suites include exclusive Executive Lounge access with complimentary breakfast, snacks and drinks. The hotel's exterior complements the architectural and ornamental features of the street and the city, including its facade, building height and golden brass railings. Inside, you'll discover the drawings, watercolors and art work by Austrian artists during 1850-1950. Art Deco touches are on display in the lobby and in guest rooms, too.Hilton

name: Steigenberger Hotel Herrenhof
description: Built in 1913, Steigenberger Hotel Herrenhof is located in the centre of the first district of Vienna, only a few steps from the Hofburg Imperial Palace. Free WiFi is available. The Herrenhof’s air-conditioned rooms are very spacious and comfortably furnished. The Viennese studio Einwaller decorated the rooms and other parts of the hotel with 21st century interpretations of various styles, from Baroque to Art Déco. The Steigenberger Hotel Herrenhof offers a varied spa programme in an elegant and relaxed atmosphere. The spa covers 250 m² over 2 floors and includes 2 saunas. A fitness centre is also available on site. The surrounding historic part of Vienna is a UNESCO World Cultural Heritage Site. The Kohlmarkt and Graben luxury shopping streets as well as St. Stephen's Cathedral can be reached within less than a 5-minute walk from the Hotel Herrenhof. The Hofburg Congress and Event Centre is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Plaza Premium Wien
description: Located in Vienna, 3.5 km from Vienna Main Railway Station, PLAZA Premium Wien provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel has a terrace and a bar. The hotel features a sauna and an ATM. At the hotel each room includes air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. At PLAZA Premium Wien all rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or vegetarian options. The accommodation offers a children's playground. There is an on-site snack bar and guests can also make use of the business area. Speaking Arabic, German, English and Romanian at the reception, staff are always on hand to help. Wien Westbahnhof Railway Station is 4.2 km from PLAZA Premium Wien, while Schönbrunn Palace is 4.6 km away. The nearest airport is Vienna International Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: Quality Hotel Vienna
description: Boasting an excellent position near some of Vienna s most renowned attractions, Quality Hotel Vienna is a recently refurbished family friendly hotel ideal for a comfortable stay in the Austrian capital. A perfect choice for business and leisure guests, our hotel offers spacious, tastefully decorated accommodations and facilities that will bring maximum comfort during your stay in Vienna. The rooms and suites at the Quality Hotel Vienna all include elegant interiors and a wide assortment of amenities such as prime quality bedding, free WiFi access, an ensuite bathroom with a bathtub or shower and classic toiletries, a flatscreen TV, coffee and tea making facilities and air conditioning. Business travellers and leisure guests can take advantage of our onsite restaurant serving exquisite international specialities for lunch and dinner, full buffet breakfast and an onsite meeting room suitable for hosting business retreats, workshops and team activities. From Quality Hotel Vienna you can easily reach some of the city s most popular attractions, including the amazing Schloss Schonbrunn castle, and the famous zoo Tierpark Wien.Choice Hotels

name: Radisson Red Hotel, Vienna
description: Set in Vienna, 1.3 km from St. Stephen's Cathedral, Radisson RED Hotel, Vienna offers accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and free WiFi. Guests can make use of a bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Radisson RED Hotel, Vienna features certain units with city views, and rooms include a kettle. At the accommodation every room includes bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, American and vegetarian options. At Radisson RED Hotel, Vienna you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Pizza and international cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Popular points of interest near the hotel include St. Peter's Catholic Church, Vienna Volksgarten and Vienna City Hall. The nearest airport is Vienna International Airport, 19 km from Radisson RED Hotel, Vienna.

name: Hotel Wandl
description: Located in the heart of Vienna, Hotel Wandl provides modern rooms with a flat-screen satellite TV, just 200 metres from the St. Stephen’s Cathedral. The hotel is just 250 metres from the shopping street Kärntner Straße and offers free WiFi in all areas. All rooms come with wooden floors and a bathroom with amenities like a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms come with a sofa. The hotel is located in a building dating back to 1850. It features an elevator and a 24-hour front desk. Shuttle services can be requested and tickets for different events can be organised on site. A bar serving a wide range of hot and cold drinks is featured at the Wandl hotel. Each day, a breakfast buffet can be enjoyed on site. The Stephansplatz Underground Station (lines U1, U3) is a 2-minute walk away. The Hofburg Palace with its Congress and Event Centre is an 8-minute walk away from the hotel.

name: Arcotel Donauzentrum
description: Opened in August 2017 and directly opposite the Kagran Underground Station (line U1) and a 10-minute ride from the city centre, ARCOTEL Donauzentrum Wien is part of the Donauzentrum, Vienna’s largest shopping centre. Free WiFi is available. All rooms of the newly-built ARCOTEL feature a 40-inch flat-screen Smart TV with Apple Airplay and Miracast, and a bathroom with free toiletries. Tea and water are available free of charge around the clock. Guests of the Donauzentrum ARCOTEL benefit from a bar and conference rooms. Garage parking is offered at a surcharge featuring a charging station for e-cars. The Donauplex cinema and entertainment centre is next to the hotel, and the United Nations office is just 2 underground stops away. The Donauinsel Recreation Area is 950 metres away.

name: Somerset Schoenbrunn Vienna
description: Located 3.6 km from Schönbrunn Palace, Somerset Schönbrunn Vienna offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony. Complimentary WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site. Featuring a kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, each unit also comes with a safety deposit box, a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The apartment offers a buffet or continental breakfast. Somerset Schönbrunn Vienna offers a children's playground. A an indoor play area is also available for guests at the accommodation. Schönbrunner Gardens is 3.7 km from Somerset Schönbrunn Vienna, while Wien Westbahnhof Railway Station is 4.5 km away. The nearest airport is Vienna International Airport, 22 km from the apartment.

name: Hotel Indigo Vienna - Naschmarkt
description: Tucked away just a stone's throw from the lively city centre of Vienna, within the Margareten district, you'll find the Hotel Indigo Vienna - Naschmarkt. This beautiful hotel takes its design inspiration from the stories of its neighbourhood. The secret gardens and hidden green spaces of the area come alive in the hotel, across the charming terrace, beautiful courtyard, and rooftop garden as well as spilling into the interior design of the hotel public spaces and bedrooms. Take a stroll out of the hotel and you'll discover the nearby vibrant Naschmarkt, a must see for visitors and the place where locals gather at all times of the day. At night, once the shops close, a selection of unique restaurants and bars, influenced by cuisines from all over the world, come alive. The neighbourhood is also famed for its boutique shops, selling unique products you wouldn't find elsewhere. Situated perfectly for exploring the city, the hotel is within walking distance of the state opera, the “Steffl” (Stephansdom), and the museums and imposing buildings on the Ringstrasse. The hotel is well connected to local transport links and its right next door to the metro station U4 Pilgramgasse, meaning attractions such as the fairy's wheel at Prater and the majestic palace of Schoenbrunn are easy to explore.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Bellevue Hotel
description: Just a 10-minute ride on tram line D or on the U4 metro line from the very centre of Vienna, Hotel Bellevue Wien occupies a historic building dating from the end of the 19th century and offers you air-conditioned rooms, free WiFi and a restaurant. The hotel has been entirely renovated in 2016. Free WiFi is available. The spacious rooms come with a bathtub or shower. Hotel Bellevue's restaurant serves Viennese specialities and international cuisine. The Liechtenstein Palace with its Baroque garden and its collection of Renaissance and Baroque paintings is just a few steps away. Within a 10-minute walk you can reach the huge Augarten Park. Within a 5-minute walk you can reach the Friedensbrücke stop of the U4 metro line, offering direct connections to Schönbrunn Palace and to the centre of Vienna. Tram line D stops just around the corner and also get's you to the centre in 10 minutes.

name: Hilton Vienna Waterfront
description: Soak up stunning views of the River Danube from the Hilton Vienna Danube Waterfront hotel, located on the waterfront hotel in Vienna. Our Vienna hotel offers a quick underground connection to the city center - 7 minutes. Enjoy the comfort of spacious guest rooms and a sparkling outdoor pool. Sample delicious international and Austrian dishes, prepared with the freshest seasonal ingredients, at the Waterfront restaurant. During the summer months enjoy meals and drinks on the spacious Waterfront terrace. Catch up with friends throughout the day and enjoy a drink or tasty snack in the welcoming Pier 269 Bar and Lounge. Business is a pleasure at the Hilton Vienna Danube Waterfront hotel offering a business-service center, an elegant boardroom, nine meeting rooms flooded with natural light and the Grand Waterfront Hall with foyer for events catering up to 600 persons. Enjoy panoramic views of Vienna's skyline in the 8th floor Executive Lounge. All guest rooms at Hilton Vienna Danube Waterfront hotel offer WiFi and a separate working area.Hilton

name: NH Danube City
description: NH Danube City is in the ideal location for business and pleasure. The hotel is right by the UN Building and the Vienna International Center. You can reach Vienna’s city center by public transportation, and the Kaisermühlen-Vienna International Center station is very close to the hotel. Guests can shop at the nearby Donauzentrum shopping center or enjoy the recreational activities available on Danube Island, for example yachting and tennis. The comfortable and modern rooms at NH Danube City are equipped with free Wi-Fi and tea and coffee facilities. Some of the rooms have spectacular views of the Danube River. From the 18th floor you will get an amazing outlook over the city. Breakfast will give you energy for the day with a varied spread of delicious foods and beverages. Enjoy your lunch and dinner at Tarragona restaurant, which serves both à-la-carte and buffet-style meals. Accompany your dinner with a great wine from our extensive list, or enjoy a drink at the bar, which you will also find a restaurant at one end. For business travelers, there are 10 meeting rooms. There is also a gym at the hotel and guests enjoy special rates at a nearby spa.NH Hoteles

name: Hotel Imperial, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Vienna
description: Home to such iconic classical composers as Mozart, Beethoven, Schubert and Strauss, Vienna boasts more than 50 theaters and opera houses. The Vienna waltz originated here and its centuries-old spirit still permeates the city's dancehalls. Our expert concierge and butlers attend to all wishes and desires before they are expressed, such as having a hand-ironed newspaper delivered bedside with morning tea. Tastefully furnished with precious, authentic antiques, walls cocooned in jewel-toned silk, and bathrooms made of marble, our 79 rooms and 59 suites blend the timeless elegance of 19th Century Vienna with state-of-the-art facilities and amenities. Voted amongst Travel + Leisure 500 Best Hotels in the World in 2022 and earning the Travellers’ Choice Best of the Best Award 2022, our renowned hotel awaits with a matchless experience.Marriott

name: Citadines South Vienna
description: Citadines South Vienna features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Vienna, 2 km from Vienna Main Railway Station, 3.2 km from Belvedere Palace and 3.5 km from Karlskirche. Complimentary WiFi is offered and private parking is available on site. Each unit comes with a fully equipped kitchen with a dining table, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A dishwasher, a microwave and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine. A gym and a business centre with a fax machine and photocopier are at guests' disposal at the aparthotel. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area. Museum of Military History is 3.5 km from Citadines South Vienna, while Vienna State Opera is 3.6 km away. The nearest airport is Vienna International Airport, 19 km from the accommodation.

name: Bassena Wien Donaustadt
description: BASSENA Wien Donaustadt is a place where people meet and opposites coexist in harmony. Trendy and elegant, cutting-edge and classic. Urban and close to the river Danube. The new hotel is perfect for individualists looking for convenience and character.iHotelier/iStay

name: The Levante Parliament A Design Hotel
description: The Levante Parliament is a modern, centrally located design hotel directly behind Vienna’s Town Hall and the Austrian Parliament in the 8th district. Many important sights are within easy walking distance and the Ringstraße Boulevard can be reached within 5 minutes on foot. This 4-star hotel features a wonderful 400 m² garden area and the Nemtoi Lounge. The Levante Parliament has a fitness centre and a sauna, which can be used free of charge. There is a 24-hour reception, as well as a concierge and a porter service. Stephansplatz is a 10-minute metro ride from Levante Parliament. Rathausplatz Metro Station is less than 100 metres away.

name: Moxy Vienna City East
description: The streets of Vienna is paved with culture, the streets of other cities with asphalt Karl Kraus 1874 to 1936, Austrian writer and journalist. Discover a hotel with an innovative design and playful soul at rates that make it accessible to all. Located on the east of Vienna, only 9 minutes away from the city center, where you can discover the beautiful old town. Other attractions like the Schonbrunn Castle are a few subway stations away from the city center. Our 203 pet friendly hotel rooms are cleverly designed to meet the modern travelers needs and furiously fast, free WIFI. Immersive social spaces are built for co working and play encouraging guests and locals to intermingle. Enjoy our breakfast, take a spin at our 24hour gym or chill out at our Moxy Bar. Get ready to Play On at Moxy Vienna City East.Marriott

name: NH Collection Wien Zentrum
description: NH Collection Wien Zentrum, Vienna, formerly known as NH Wien Atterseehaus, is located on the Mariahilferstrasse, one of the longest shopping streets in Europe. Some of the main attractions in Vienna are a short distance away, including the city’s Museum Quarter. Guests enjoy easy access to designer shops, restaurants, and bars. Directly in front of the hotel is the Zieglergasse subway station providing easy links to the rest of the city. The hotel is set in a 7-story building with a grand façade painted in the mid-nineties by Austrian pop artist Christian Ludwig Attersee. NH Collection Wien Zentrum offers some of the most spacious accommodations in Vienna so that guests can feel at home. The newly-renovated rooms are designed for your comfort and feature rain-effect showers, relaxation chairs and NH sleep better mattresses. Some also have access to a balcony and kitchenettes. Guests can stay connected with free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. In the mornings, enjoy a fresh, delicious breakfast on the hotel’s rooftop terrace, which provides spectacular views of the city. For guests staying on the weekend, the hotel offers Lazy Sundays with free late checkout and breakfast until noon. The hotel has a compact gym and sauna facilities.NH Hoteles

name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna - MGallery
description: The elegant Hotel am Konzerthaus Vienna is in the heart of Vienna surrounded by impressive art and music houses. The Vienna Konzerthaus, State Opera, St. Stephen's Cathedral, Musikverein and Belvedere Palace - the new design of the hotel and restaurant was inspired by these cultural sites, become a part of Vienna's enchanting history.accorhotels.com

name: Holiday Inn Vienna - South
description: New-built hotel located in a tower overlooking the beautiful city of ViennaThe Holiday Inn® Vienna – South is located in the emerging district of Vienna- Wienerberg with easy access to the city centre and providing you with stunning views over the city. Whether you are travelling to Vienna for leisure or business purposes, with Holiday Inn® Vienna – South you already found your new favourite spot. Easily accessible by the motorway, public transportation and the Airport, you will get to the most famous sights like the lively Naschmarkt, the charming Karlsplatz or the State Opera within 20-30 minutes. All 201 modern rooms provide you with a breath-taking view. Grant yourself with an upgrade to an executive room to enjoy even more amenities during your stay. Family rooms with separate beds, sleeping couches or connecting doors will be of great benefit for weekend trips with your family. Take advantage of the hotel`s highlight, the sky restaurant on the top floor whilst enjoying your favourite food or drinks with an amazing view. Stay healthy during your stay and make use of the Wienerberg Park just around the corner to discover your personal jogging route or improve your handicap at Golfclub Wienerberg, within a five minutes’ walk from the hotel.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Lindner Hotel Am Belvedere
description: Right next to Belvedere Palace, this 4-star hotel offers modern rooms with a flat-screen TV and free WiFi. Workstations with free internet access are available at the hotel. It is 5 minutes’ walk from the Rennweg transport hub, offering a 20-minute direct connection to Vienna Airport with the S7 suburban metro line (Schnellbahn). The air-conditioned rooms at Lindner Hotel Am Belvedere also come with a safe and a private bathroom. The 24-hour staff can provide a wake-up service. A laundry service, including ironing, and a shuttle service are available on request. The restaurant Heuriger Am Belvedere serves traditional Austrian cuisine and seasonal dishes. Guests can also relax at the on-site bar. Underground parking spaces are available on request.

name: NH Wien City
description: The NH Wien City hotel is set in a perfect location on Mariahilferstrasse and puts guests within easy reach of excellent shopping selections and points of interest. The Leopold Museum and Museum of Natural History are less than a kilometer away and Vienna’s historical city center is only a 10-minute walk. The Neubaugasse metro station is conveniently situated in front of the hotel. Each of our 105 spacious rooms offer modern conveniences. Free Wi-Fi, flat screen TVs, and coffee and tea-making facilities come as standard in every room. For those looking for even greater comfort, we offer an Apartment Suite which has a separate sitting area and kitchenette complete with Nespresso machine. In the mornings, guests are welcome to enjoy a healthy breakfast buffet. For early risers, we offer an early bird breakfast option. Our open bar supplies light refreshments 24 hours a day, every day. Given the numerous local restaurants, we will gladly recommend high-quality dining options for lunch and dinner. Our compact gym, sauna and relaxation area are additional amenities that our guests can enjoy. To further enhance your stay, an 8 seater airport shuttle is available and our 24-hour front desk is ready to provide additional amenities upon request.NH Hoteles

name: Austria Trend Hotel Maximilian
description: Welcome to Hotel Maximilian **** in Vienna Hotel Maximilian impresses with historic flair in a posh setting and its unpretentious charm. Find out more about the fascinating history of the four-star hotel in Hietzing, the 13th Viennese district and look forward to a majestic stay in a uniquely modern atmosphere! A true visitors magnet is nearby Schnbrunn Palace. With its lavish interior, it attracts lovers of culture and the arts from all over the world. What differentiates its younger brother from Parkhotel Schnbrunn? While the Parkhotel impresses guests with a luxuriant interior, Hotel Maximilian boasts a perfect blend of tradition and modernity. Its best described as an entirely new interpretation of the term imperial. Generous use of the colour blue and lots of wood reflect Archduke Maximilians love of nature, the ocean and seafaring. 41 deluxe rooms, including 7 deluxe rooms with balcony. We offer our guests a fitness room with very modern Technogym equipment as well as a Finnish sauna.iHotelier/iStay

name: NH Wien Belvedere
description: Conveniently situated within a five minute walk of the Belvedere Palace, the beautiful NH Wien Belvedere hotel provides guests with the perfect stay. The hotel is only three tram stops away from downtown Vienna with its famous State Opera, Hundertwasserhaus, and Stephansdom. Rennweg train station is only a few steps away from the hotel. All of the 114 rooms have traditional décor with modern amenities including free Wi-Fi, flat screen TVs, and a minibar. Connecting rooms are also available. Our spacious rooms on the upper floors offer lovely views of Belvedere Park or the botanic garden. A tasty breakfast buffet is served daily. Guests are welcome to request an early bird breakfast or made-to-order hot dishes. For lunch and dinner, our staff will happily recommend local options such as Salmbräu which is a popular brewery serving roasted ham hock. For quick refreshments, the self-serve open bar has numerous choices. Our compact fitness center is free for guests to use and lockers are available. There is also a sauna, steam bath, and relaxation room for the optimal experience. Our professional staff is always on hand to ensure that guests have the perfect stay.NH Hoteles

name: Rosewood Vienna
description: Set in Vienna, a few steps from St. Peter's Catholic Church, Rosewood Vienna offers accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is 200 metres from the city centre and 300 metres from St. Stephen's Cathedral. All rooms include a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while some boast city views. The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or Full English/Irish options. At the hotel guests are welcome to take advantage of a spa centre. Popular points of interest near Rosewood Vienna include Vienna Volksgarten, House of Music and Hofburg. The nearest airport is Vienna International Airport, 18 km from the accommodation.

name: Zola Hotel - Palais de Bohème Adults Only
description: Zola Hotel - Palais de Bohème Adults Only features a fitness centre, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Vienna. Featuring a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 600 metres from Messe Wien, 1.1 km from Vienna Prater and 2 km from Ernst Happel Stadium. The hotel has a sauna, room service and free WiFi. The units at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and slippers. At Zola Hotel - Palais de Bohème Adults Only every room has bed linen and towels. Austria Center Vienna is 3.1 km from the accommodation, while Kunst Haus Wien - Museum Hundertwasser is 3.7 km away. The nearest airport is Vienna International Airport, 18 km from Zola Hotel - Palais de Bohème Adults Only.

name: Theaterhotel & Suites Wien
description: The Theaterhotel & Suites Wien is a 4-star hotel in a very central location directly next to the famous “Theater in der Josefstadt”, Vienna’s oldest theatre. The magnificent buildings of the Ringstrasse can be reached in a few minutes’ walk. The Town Hall, the Burgtheater, the Parliament and the University are only a few steps away. After a long business day or a sightseeing tour through Vienna, you will enjoy the quiet ambience in this hotel, the rooms will provide relaxing moments. Start the day with a breakfast, enjoy the offer of our buffet and strengthen yourself for the day. Parking is possible at a surcharge and needs to be reserved in advance (subject to availability).

name: Living Hotel Kaiser Franz Joseph
description: Located in an elegant residential area in Vienna's 19th district, Living Hotel Kaiser Franz Joseph offers an elegant lobby bar and a spa area with a sauna and fitness room. Free WiFi is available. All rooms at Living Hotel Kaiser Franz Joseph come with bathrooms and satellite TV. Some rooms also include a fully equipped kitchen, a large seating area, and a balcony or terrace. Guests can enjoy a cocktail in our newly renovated Kaiserbar in the lobby late into the evening. Buffet breakfast is available. The Living Hotel Kaiser Franz Joseph is situated in the elegant residential district of Döbling in the city's northwest. From here, guests can reach Vienna’s centre in just 20 minutes with tram line 38, which stops 100 metres away. In summer, many Heuriger (traditional Viennese wine taverns) are nearby.

name: Arcotel Kaiserwasser Vienna
description: The 4-star superior ARCOTEL Kaiserwasser is located opposite Vienna’s United Nations headquarters and the Austria Center Vienna, next to the Kaiserwasser pond with a bathing jetty. Kaisermühlen Underground Station is just 100 metres away, and the city centre can be reached in a 10-minute ride. Free WiFi is available in all rooms. Rooms at ARCOTEL Kaiserwasser Wien offers views of the modern skyline of the DonauCity or the Kaiserwasser recreation area. Decorated with a red and white colour pattern, they all come with cable TV channels and DVD players. The Kaiserwasser ARCOTEL Superior features a modern gym with views of the Danube and the city centre, a sauna and a steam bath. The restaurant serves typical Austrian specialities as well as vegan options. There is also an inviting bar on site. Private garage parking is available at a surcharge. The Vienna Airport Lines bus stops directly in front of the hotel. The Kaiserwasser recreation area is right outside the hotel and the Donauinsel recreation area is just a 5-minute walk away. Within a 5-minute metro ride you can reach the large Donauzentrum shopping centre. You can also quickly reach the hotel via the Kagran exit of the A22 motorway.

name: Park Hyatt Vienna
description: The Park Hyatt Vienna is located in the city centre's Golden Quarter, in a former bank building dating back to the early 1900s and combines luxury with Viennese elegance. It offers a luxurious wellness area with an indoor swimming pool, a 24-hour reception, and an à la carte restaurant. Free WiFi is available in the entire hotel. Ranging from 35 to 170 m² in size, the air-conditioned rooms and suites at the Park Hyatt are elegantly furnished, combining modern appliances with typical Viennese décor. Each unit features a flat-screen TV, a fully-stocked minibar and a private bathroom fitted with a bathtub or shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Guests can choose from various dining options, including brasserie classics and modern drinks at the historical The Bank Brasserie & Bar, a selection of whiskys at the Living Room Lounge, traditional Viennese coffee specialities at the Café am Hof and afternoon tea at the Lounge. At the in-house wellness area Arany Spa guests can indulge in a vast selection of relaxing beauty and body treatments or exercise at the state-of-the-art fitness centre and at the 15-metre-long indoor swimming pool. Park Hyatt Vienna offers 800 square metres of modern meeting space in beautifully-restored historical room. All venues are equipped with state-of-the-art technology. Some of Vienna's most famous sights, including Saint Stephen's Square and Cathedral, and the Kärntner Straße shopping street, can be easily reached within a 5-minute walk from the Park Hyatt. Several luxury shops as well as many bars and cafés are also just steps away. The Hofburg Congress and Event Centre is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Ruby Lissi Hotel Vienna
description: Located in Vienna's first district and set in a historic building dating back to the 18th century, within walking distance of the Schwedenplatz and St. Stephan's Cathedral, Ruby Lissi Hotel Vienna offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The luxuriously furnished rooms feature wooden floors, cherry-wood panelling, fine fabrics and a carefully composed light concept. Pocket spring mattresses and oversized bed linen, an open-plan bathroom with a glass rain shower, free toiletries and oversized towels are further amenities. A Marshall amp speaker and a 40 inch flat-screen TV are also featured. Around the clock, guests of the Ruby Lissi can enjoy a selection of Italian antipasti and snacks, beverages and selected wines. The breakfast buffet contains high quality products from the region, whole-wheat bread and rolls, hand-cut fruit, muesli and Hausbrandt coffee. Hot beverages and a vending machine are available all day in the corridors on the 1st and 2nd floor. Electric guitars can be rented and there is an online playlist available for all guests. Bike rental is available, as well. The Schwedenplatz Metro Stop is 170 metres away, while Graben is 600 metres away. The nearest airport is Vienna International Airport, 17 km from Ruby Lissi Hotel Vienna.

name: Palais Coburg Residenz
description: Palais Coburg Hotel Residenz is a 5-star luxury hotel in a historic building in the centre of Vienna. It offers air-conditioned suites, a gourmet restaurant, and free WiFi and wired internet access. An exclusive spa area over the roofs of Vienna, featuring a sauna, a steam bath, a hot tub, an indoor pool and a sun terrace, is available at Palais Coburg Hotel Residenz. There is also a modern fitness centre. A bottle of champagne, a fruit/chocolate treatment and a flower bouquet are provided to all guests. The price also includes free minibar consumption. Austrian and international gourmet cuisine, as well as a wide selection of fine wines are served in Silvio Nickol Gourmet Restaurant and in the Restaurant Clementine im Glashaus. On New Years Eve, guests can enjoy a gala dinner. Please note that there is a dress code (black tie). Palais Coburg Hotel Residenz is only a short walk away from St. Stephen’s Cathedral, the Stadtpark, and several underground stations.

name: acom-Hotel Vienna
description: Acom Hotel Vienna The immediate vicinity of the main train station, the Wiener Grtel located at Sdtiroler Platz Excellent infrastructural environment, 3 stops by subway to the historical city center Cozy bar Non-smoking rooms 180 comfortable rooms with free Wi-Fi and including a bottle of mineral water per stay Early check-in 11 am upon availability Late check out 14 pm upon availability Upgrade into next higher category upon availability Free Parking upon availability Welcome Drink ( for Beer/Wine/non-alcoholic drinks) The immediate vicinity of the main train station, the Wiener Grtel located at Sdtiroler Platz Excellent infrastructural environment, 3 stops by subway to the historical city center Cozy bar Non-smoking rooms 80 comfortable rooms with free Wi-Fi and including a bottle of mineral water per stayiHotelier/iStay

name: Moxy Vienna Airport
description: Calling all Fun Hunters! The Select-Service stylish hotel Moxy Vienna Airport takes the conventional hotel concept and turns it on its head, giving you the freedom to make your visit exactly what you want it to be. Literally steps away from Vienna International Airport, we're a great choice for business travelers, families and everyone in between. Grab a seat at the communal table in the Living Room, our open-plan hotel lobby, and strike up a conversation with your fellow travelers.Take a break from the action in sleek rooms with free Wi-Fi, LED TVs and plush beds lit from underneath. Fuel up with breakfast, pose for a post-gym selfie in our 24-hour fitness center or chill out at The Now 24/7. Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes trained pets for a EUR 15 per night non-refundable fee. Our three versatile venue spaces are tailor-made for intimate meetings and soirees. Guests will appreciate our easy access to the city center located just 20 minutes away from our hotel. Get ready to Play On.Marriott

name: Hotel Bristol, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Vienna
description: The Hotel Bristol, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Vienna impresses with its exceptional heritage and location in the heart of the city, vis-á-vis the magnificent Vienna State Opera and in close proximity to all the most memorable sights. The Bristol - truly an Art Deco gem - has been one of Vienna’s prime addresses since 1892 and serves as a living example of Viennese charm and personalized service. 150 exclusive rooms including 24 unique suites all feel like turn-of-the-century apartments and offer spectacular views of the city.Marriott

name: BASSENA Wien Messe Prater
description: BASSENA Wien Messe Prater is nestled between city and parkland amid the flourishing Prater district with its Prater amusement park and the exhibition centre. The second district is flourishing generally. Thats thanks to this areas blend of market culture, exciting stores, excellent restaurants and trendy bars. Such as those on the Danube Canal or in the Karmeliter district. The underground line U2 (station Messe-Prater) allows you to reach the historical city centre within 4 minutes.Each room features a spacious king-size bed, a 55 HD flat-screen with mobile device and desktop compatibility as well as a Nespresso machine with complimentary coffee.Our kitchen is a bar, a bistro and a cafe. Or simply a place where people can get together and have fun.In the morning, we serve a sumptuous breakfast buffet and whats more: in the guest fridge youll find delicacies that youre free to help yourself to any time you like.The entire hotel is accessible. An electric vehicle charging station is available. (Access via Perspektivstrae.)iHotelier/iStay

name: Best Western Plus Celebrity Suites
description: ‘Celebrate Your Life’ the house at Wehlistrasse 153 was once built in 1900 by the master builder Klima. He called it the Reichsbrueckenhof. This name still stands on the facade of the building. As a master builder he was able to use the best and most expensive materials. We benefit from this to this day, as the substance of the house is of outstanding quality. This allowed us to convert any reconstruction work around the former art nouveau residential building, which was decorated with the most splendid art nouveau elements both inside and out, into a modern apartment hotel. Today, arrived in 2019, the Best Western Plus Celebrity Suites shines in new splendor and yet the historic look has been retained. 53 state-of-the-art apartments, both technically and stylistically, make this house, located between the Danube and Vienna's green lung, the Prater, a jewel in the heart of the city. All apartments have fully equipped kitchens and modern bathrooms. The apartments for up to 8 guests can be used for short- or long-term stays. A varied breakfast buffet as well as a bar in the lounge area offering snacks and drinks round off the gastronomic offer. The reception team, which is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week for any inquiries, is looking forward to your visit. Furthermore, guests can clean their laundry in the in-house coin laundry and, of course, the Best Western Plus Celebrity Suites has a professionally equipped fitness room with Technogym equipment. Public transportation such as subway, rapid transit, bus, and airport buses are in the immediate vicinity. If you want to travel by car, you can use our garage in the adjacent building to park your car comfortably. The Rosenberg family and the team of the Best Western Plus Celebrity Suites in Vienna are looking forward to welcoming you.bestwestern.com

name: The Harmonie Vienna
description: The family-owned The Harmonie Vienna, BW Premier Collection returns fresh and unique. The newly designed boutique hotel is centrally and yet quietly located in the authentic Serviten Quarter off the beaten tourist tracks. Enjoy the lively and authentic neighborhood with trendy restaurants, bars and boutiques! The Ringstrasse and its iconic buildings are within walking distance, as is St. Stephen’s Cathedral. Tram and subway stations are located very close to the hotel. Reserved parking spaces for guests are available at a fee. The new The Harmonie Vienna, BW Premier Collection offers 66 rooms with modern facilities and natural Viennese elegance in a classical Otto Wagner building. An individual touch is given to the rooms thanks to the paintings by the artist Luis Casanova Sorolla. They show the traces of a dance performance and transform each room of the boutique hotel into a unique art experience. The rooms are equipped with very comfortable beds, a large desk, wireless internet, mini bar, tea and coffee set, a flat screen television, an ironing board and iron and a laptop suitable safe. Some rooms are allergy-friendly according to ECARF standards. Guests of our hotel can enjoy a nutritious breakfast buffet with regional and organic products. The heart of our boutique hotel is the cozy lounge area with bar and library. Here you can read the paper, relax with a cup of tea and recharge your batteries. A small fitness studio and a 24-hour shop are also available for our guests. The Harmonie Vienna, BW Premier Collection stands for a responsible lifestyle. Sustainability, quality and eco-friendly services are guaranteed by the Austrian Ecolabel. Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Holiday Inn Vienna City
description: Family-friendly Freihausviertel district hotel close to Vienna city centre, with a restaurant and a bar Holiday Inn® Vienna City hotel is a 15-minute walk from the city centre. From Paulanergasse tram stop, seven minutes from the hotel, you can catch line 1, taking you round the Ringstraße. Vienna International Airport (VIE) is a 25-minute drive away, and Vienna HBF train station is a 10-minute taxi ride away. The lively open-air Naschmarkt food market is a six-minute walk from the hotel. Also within walking distance is charming Karlsplatz square with its monumental church. Fashionistas will love discovering and browsing the many neighbourhood boutiques, such as Pregenzer, an Austrian designer gem, seven minutes from the hotel. Music lovers won't want to miss the Musikverein concert hall and State Opera, all less than 20 minutes' walk away. Host up to 50 people in the hotel's three meeting rooms, and take advantage of the courtyard for outdoor sessions. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Sophisticated rooms and suites have a pillow menu to ensure a good night's sleep – and kids stay and eat free. Start the day with a hot breakfast buffet and later savour local dishes in the Wiener Moderne restaurant. Relax in the lobby lounge with its distinctive period furnishings, or enjoy a a slice of Guglhupf cake and drink in the bar.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Imlauer Vienna
description: Only a 10-minute walk away from the city centre, the stylish 4-star hotel Imlauer Wien is located in a quiet side street between 2 underground stations, which are both only 200 metres away. Free WiFi is available. The modern, air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen satellite TV with free Sky channels, a minibar, a safe, and a bathroom. Guests of the Imlauer Wien can relax in the modern bar in the glass-covered conservatory. The sauna, the fitness centre and the internet corner are available free of charge. The congress and exhibition centre, as well as the Vienna Prater with the Giant Ferris Wheel and the Augarten, a beautiful park, are in the immediate vicinity of Hotel Imlauer Wien.

name: The Ritz-Carlton, Vienna
description: The Ritz-Carlton, Vienna, located in four historic 19th-century palaces combines legendary service with Austrian hospitality. The 200 luxurious guest rooms and suites are generously proportioned and stylishly furnished. The Ritz-Carlton Club Lounge on the 7th floor pampers its guests with personalized service as well as five culinary offers per day. The Ritz-Carlton Spa has elegantly appointed treatment suites, an 18m indoor pool and a range of amenities that invite our guests to unique spa experiences. Unique culinary delights await guests at the farm-to-table Dstrikt Steakhouse, during aperitivo time at Pastamara - Bar con Cucina and the elegant hotel bar D-bar. Located on the 8th floor rooftop terrace, the Atmosphere Rooftop Bar offers a breathtaking view over the city. Located in the heart of the city and only a short walk from the city park, the luxury hotel is the perfect starting point to discover Vienna.Marriott

name: Adina Apartment Hotel Vienna Belvedere
description: Adina Apartment Hotel Vienna Belvedere provides comfortable 4-star accommodation in Vienna. It has a fitness centre, as well as a sauna, a swimming pool and free Wi-Fi. The hotel provides luggage storage and a 24-hour reception. It is dog-friendly and has private parking on site for those travelling with a car. The rooms at Adina Apartment Hotel Vienna Belvedere are air conditioned and soundproofed for guest comfort. For guests who wish to cook their own meals, there is a kitchen that is conveniently equipped with a dishwasher, a microwave and a refrigerator. Those staying at Adina Apartment Hotel Vienna Belvedere can relax at the in-house bar, ideally located for a drink. The hotel is close to Sudtiroler Platz-Hauptbahnhof, making it easy for guests to explore Vienna and its surrounding areas. The Schloss Belvedere and the Osterreichische Galerie Belvedere are a short walk away.Revato

name: Hampton by Hilton Vienna Messe
description: Hampton by Hilton Vienna Messe, a new hotel presented in style of Hampton's new generation, offers 192 Rooms, free breakfast, meeting facilities (23 sqm) and a fitness area on the 7th Floor. The hotel is situated next to the Exhibition Center "Read Messe", the Football Stadio "Ernst Happel Stadium" and the famous "Prater" (entertainment area). Public transports are reachable in a few minutes walking distance. A public garage is situated directly at the hotel.Hilton

name: Boutique Hotel Am Stephansplatz
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 53 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and espresso makers. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access is available. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and electric kettles. Amenities Enjoy recreational amenities such as a 24-hour health club and a sauna. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours). Property Location With a stay at Boutique Hotel Am Stephansplatz, you'll be centrally located in Vienna, steps from Wien Museum Virgilkapelle and St. Stephen's Cathedral. This 4-star hotel is 0.5 mi (0.7 km) from Ankeruhr and 0.6 mi (1 km) from St. Ruprecht's Church. Dining Enjoy a meal at Cafe Giacomo Aragall or snacks in the coffee shop/cafe. The hotel also offers room service (during limited hours). A complimentary buffet breakfast is served on weekdays from 6:30 AM to 10:00 AM and on weekends from 6:30 AM to 11:00 AM. Optional Charges Airport shuttle fee: EUR 52 per vehicle (one-way, maximum occupancy 3) Offsite parking fee: EUR 20 per day (0.7 mi away) Late check-out is available for a fee (subject to availability) The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. To arrange pick-up, guests must contact the property 48 hours prior to arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival.
